title: Playing Games
content: I love to play games on PC. I use to play games even when I feel bad, to get out of it. I feel like normal after spends time on it.

title: Listening Songs
content: Just like others, i love listening songs while traveling. Apart from the music, I use to listen to the lyrics a lot. I only hear the song with good lyrics.

title: New Technologies
content: I always like to know about mechanical & electronic based technology.

title: Movies
content: I like to watch Sci-Fi, Mystery, Horror, Fantasy, Action, Crime and Comedy movies.

title: Just Thinking
content: Just like everyone, I use to think a lot about something. But I feel like I'm over doing it.
